SEARCH
Package cams.model.appitem

Class Suggestion

java.lang.Object
cams.model.appitem.Suggestion
All Implemented Interfaces:
Displayable, DisplayableSplitter, Model, Savable
public class Suggestion extends Object implements Model, DisplayableSplitter
This class represents a suggestion made by a user for a camp. An suggestion can be created, viewed, edited, approved and deleted. The class also provides methods to access and manipulate attributes of the enquiries.

  • Constructor Details

    • Suggestion

      public Suggestion(String suggestionID, String campID, String createdBy, Boolean processed, Boolean deleted, String suggestionMessage, Boolean approved)
      Default constructor.
      Parameters:
      suggestionID - Id of the suggestion.
      campID - Id of the camp associated with the suggestion.
      createdBy - Id of the user the suggestion is associated with.
      processed - True if the suggestion has been processed, false otherwise.
      deleted - True if the suggestion has been deleted, false otherwise.
      suggestionMessage - The content of the suggestion message.
      approved - True if the suggestion has been approved, false otherwise.

    • Suggestion

      createdBy - Id of the user the suggestion is associated with.
      suggestionMessage - The content of the suggestion message.
